recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to LDSI New York, Inc.'s Chairman & Chief Executive, Larry Morris(larry@ldsi.com), for prompt resolution. If the issue cannot be resolved to that individual's satisfaction, LDSI New York, Inc. will agree to mediate the issue with the New York, NY office of the American Arbitration Association. Any individual may file a request for mediation with the American Arbitration Association.
